xwikidoc.title: WatchListTranslations
xwikidoc.content:
### Macro "watchlist" rendering.macro.watchlist.name=Lista de Acompanhamentos rendering.macro.watchlist.description=Apresenta o conteúdo dos itens acompanhados.
### XWiki.WatchListClass XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_realtime=Em tempo real XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_Scheduler.WatchListHourlyNotifier=A cada Hora XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_Scheduler.WatchListDailyNotifier=Diário XWiki.WatchListClass_interval_Scheduler.WatchListWeeklyNotifier=Semanal
### Notification Icons ### Missing: watchlist.notifications.icons.on=ON ### Missing: watchlist.notifications.icons.off=OFF watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.page=Seguir esta página watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.pageAndChildren=Seguir esta página e filhas watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.space=Seguir a página pai e suas filhas watchlist.notifications.icons.tooltip.wiki=Seguir esta wiki ### Missing: watchlist.notifications.changeStatusError=Failed to change the status of the WatchList. ### Missing: watchlist.settings=Settings
### Watchlist livetable (in the macro) ### Missing: watchlist.table.scope.wiki=All pages of the wiki ### Missing: watchlist.table.scope.pageandchildren=Page + Children ### Missing: watchlist.table.scope.pageonly=Page Only ### Missing: watchlist.table.location=Location ### Missing: watchlist.table.scope=Scope
